overview.role_description:
1. Yuanwu is an Electro sub-DPS who excels at Coordinated Attack.
2. Yuanwu boosts the resistance to interruption of the entire team.
3. Yuanwu has high Concerto Energy efficiency. His Outro Skill calls down lightning centered on the target, dealing significant Vibration Strength DMG to enemies hit.
overview.synopsis:
1. Tip: Start with Resonance Skill to summon the Thunder Wedge, then switch to your main DPS. When [Readiness] is fully charged, switch back, hold E to enter an enhanced state, then use a Heavy Attack followed by Basic Attacks for a full combo. Follow with Resonance Skill and Resonance Liberation, then rotate out.
2. Rotation: E - Swap - Held E - HA-E-R
3. Team Comp: The most suitable main DPS is Jinhsi. The team setup of Jinhsi + Yuanwu + Shorekeeper/Verina/Baizhi works well. Please refer to the full guide for team rotation.
overview.rotation:
1. Resonance Skill
Summons [Thunder Wedge] that deals Electro DMG and creates a Thunder Field around Thunder Wedge. Thunder Wedge lasts 12 seconds. When Forte Circuit Rumbling Spark or Resonance Liberation is used, all existing [Thunder Wedges] will detonate, dealing Electro DMG (treated as Resonance Skill DMG).
● [Thunder Field]: While active character stands inside the Thunder Field, their attacks trigger Coordinated Attacks from the [Thunder Wedge] once every 1.2s (duration: 1.5s).
2. Forte Circuit
When [Readiness] is fully charged, hold E to consume all [Readiness] and cast Rumbling Spark, entering Lightning Infused. Additionally, if [Readiness] is full when casting the Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge, it will trigger Thunder Uprising.
In Lightning Infused:
● Resistance to interruption increases.
● Yuanwu’s ability to reduce enemy Vibration Strength is significantly enhanced.
● Within 3 seconds after a Heavy Attack or a successful Counterattack, tapping Basic Attack will trigger Thunderweaver, dealing Electro DMG (counts as Basic Attack DMG).
[Readiness]: Max cap is 100. ① Regenerates 6 points per second when a [Thunder Wedge] is present. This can work off-field. ② Each successful Coordinated Attack from the [Thunder Wedge] restores 5 points.
3. Resonance Liberation
Deal Electro DMG and grant Lightning Infused state to all team members for 10 seconds.
4. Normal Attack
● Basic Attack: up to 5-hit combo.
● Heavy Attack: Continuously consumes STA to attack.
● Mid-air Attack: Consumes STA to perform a Plunging Attack.
● Dodge Counter: Triggered by dodging and shortly tapping Basic Attack.
5. Intro Skill
Deals Electro DMG.
6. Outro Skill
Call down a lightning strike centered on the target, dealing significant Vibration Strength DMG to enemies hit.
Team Comp Analysis: Yuanwu’s frequent and reliable Coordinated Attacks make him ideal for building Jinhsi’s passive stacks.
Team Comp & Rotation:
In the following rotations: A = Basic Attack; H = Heavy Attack; E = Resonance Skill; R = Resonance Liberation; Q = Echo Skill.
● Jinhsi + Yuanwu + Verina/Shorekeeper/Baizhi
Yuanwu's Coordinated Attack accelerates Jinhsi’s passive stack. Verina, Shorekeeper, or Baizhi offer healing and DMG buffs.
① Jinhsi starts with E-A*4-E2-E3-A*4-E4 to trigger Unison;
② Yuanwu enters with Intro Skill + E;
③ Healer quickly fully charges Concerto Energy.
④ Jinhsi enters with Intro Skill + E2-Q-R-AAA-E3-A-E4;
⑤ Repeat.

texts.name: Originite: Type IV
texts.effectDescription: When dealing Basic Attack DMG, heals (0.5%/0.65%/0.8%/0.95%/1.1%) of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (3/3/3/3/3)s.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Healing Bonus + 10%.

texts.name: Bell-Borne Geochelone
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the protection of Bell-Borne Geochelone. Deal Glacio DMG based on 145.92% of the current character's DEF to nearby enemies, and obtain a Bell-Borne Shield that lasts for 15s



The Bell-Borne Shield provides 50.00% DMG Reduction and 10.00% DMG Boost for the current team members, and disappears after the current character is hit for 3 times.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Healing Bonus + 10%.

texts.name: Ages of Harvest
texts.effectDescription: Grants (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%) Attribute DMG Bonus. Casting Intro Skill gives the equipper Ageless Marking, which grants (24%/30%/36%/42%/48%) Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for (12/12/12/12/12)s. Casting Resonance Skill gives the equipper Ethereal Endowment, which grants (24%/30%/36%/42%/48%) Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for (12/12/12/12/12)s.

texts.name: Jué
texts.skillDescription:
Summon Jué to the aid. Jué soars through the air, dealing 48.64% Spectro DMG, and summons thunderbolts that strike nearby enemies up to 5 times, each hit dealing 19.46% Spectro DMG. Jué then spirals downward, attacking surrounding enemies twice, each hit dealing 48.64% Spectro DMG.

Casting this Echo Skill grants the Resonator a Blessing of Time effect that lasts 15s, during when:

- The Resonator gains 16.00% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus.

- When the Resonator's Resonance Skill hits the target, inflict 16.00% Spectro DMG 1 time per second for 15s, considered as the Resonator's Resonance Skill DMG.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Celestial Light
texts.description: Spectro DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.

texts.name: Stellar Symphony
texts.effectDescription: Increase HP by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Restore (8/10/12/14/16) Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (20/20/20/20/20)s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Upon using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.

texts.name: Thunderous Determination
texts.description: The DMG multiplier of Resonance Skill Thunder Uprising is increased by 40%, and its reduction efficiency of enemy Vibration Strength is enhanced.

texts.name: Reserved Confidence
texts.description: The ranges of the Resonance Skills Thunder Field and Thunder Uprising are greatly expanded. When switched off the field during combat, if "Readiness" is not full, Yuanwu will automatically leave 1 Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge in place.

texts.name: Lightning Manipulation
texts.description: Yuanwu unleashes thunderbolts in an area centered around the skill target, greatly reducing the Vibration Strength of enemies upon impact.

texts.name: Leihuangquan
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Yuanwu performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.



Heavy Attack

Yuanwu consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.



Mid-air Attack

Yuanwu consumes STA to launch a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.



Dodge Counter

Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

texts.name: Leihuang Master
texts.description:
Thunder Wedge

Yuanwu summons Thunder Wedge, dealing Electro DMG, and forms a Thunder Field centered on the Thunder Wedge. Thunder Wedge lasts for 12s.

Forte Circuit Rumbling Spark and Resonance Liberation Blazing Might will immediately detonate Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge on the field, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.



Thunder Field

The active character gains the effects below when in the Thunder Field: a Coordinated Attack from Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is triggered when attacks hit a target, dealing Electro DMG. This can be triggered once every 1.2s. The effect lasts for 1.5s.

texts.name: Unassuming Blade
texts.description:
Rumbling Spark

When "Readiness" is full, hold Resonance Skill to consume all "Readiness" and cast Rumbling Spark, dealing Electro DMG and entering the Lightning Infused state.



Thunder Uprising

When "Readiness" is full, Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will be replaced with Thunder Uprising, dealing Electro DMG.



Lightning Infused

The character in Lightning Infused state has a greatly increased resistance to interruption.

When Yuanwu is in this state:

-Basic Attacks: Hit targets in a larger range, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency.

-Heavy Attacks: Have increased attack speed, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency.

-Dodge Counters: Have increased attack speed, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency.

-Use Basic Attack within 3s after casting a Heavy Attack or a successful Counterattack to cast Thunderweaver, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.

-Does not recover "Readiness".



Readiness

Yuanwu can hold up to 100 "Readiness".

When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu gains 6 "Readiness" every second, even when he is not the active character;

When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge hits a target with a Coordinated Attack, Yuanwu gains 5 "Readiness".

texts.name: Blazing Might
texts.description: Awaken the power of thunder and provide Forte Circuit Lightning Infused status to all characters on a nearby team for 10s, then perform a powerful blow that deals Electro DMG.

texts.name: Thunder Bombardment
texts.description: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

texts.name: Blazing Might
texts.description: Awaken the power of thunder and provide Forte Circuit Lightning Infused status to all characters on a nearby team for 10s, then perform a powerful blow that deals Electro DMG.

texts.name: Thunder Bombardment
texts.description: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

texts.name: Steaming Cup of Justice
texts.description: When Yuanwu is in Forte Circuit's Lightning Infused state, his Basic Attack Speed is increased by 20%, and his Heavy Attack Speed is increased by 20%.

texts.name: Fierce Heart, Serene Mind
texts.description: Intro Skill Thunder Bombardment additionally recovers 15 Resonance Energy for Yuanwu.

texts.name: Upholder of Integrity
texts.description: When the Coordinated Attacks of Resonance Skill's Thunder Wedge hits a target, the damage is additionally increased by 20% of Yuanwu's DEF.

texts.name: Retributive Knuckles
texts.description: When casting Resonance Liberation Blazing Might, the on-field character will gain a Shield equal to 200% of Yuanwu's DEF for 10s.

texts.name: Neighborhood Protector
texts.description: When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by 50%.

texts.name: Defender of All Realms
texts.description: All team members nearby within the range of Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will gain a 32% DEF increase, lasting 3s.
